column4: == can someone help me with the following problem? == 1 QUESTION for someone: when I boot up, it get's to "Starting Ubuntu..." and then pauses about 10-15 seconds, then says "hde: timeout waiting for DMA" then repeats the delay and the "hde: ..." message about FOUR times (wasting about 2 minutes) before it continues with uneventful boot; what can I do to stop this unnecessary boot delay?
is that the partition u r booting from?
sorry, I was away a moment...YES, that is my boot partition
